title: Marriyum shares pictures of PM’s meeting with Qatar Investment Authority
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 23 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Tuesday shared the pictures of Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif’s meeting with the Qatar Investment Authority officials on her Twitter handle.
The minister, in a tweet, said areas of investment between Pakistan and Qatar were explored in the meeting.
PM Pakistan Shehbaz Sharif addressing Pakistan -Qatar Trade & Investment Roundtable 2022 #PMVisitsQatar pic.twitter.com/LIe17OSO6i
